name: Fairy and Devil
description: Kill monsters and get equipment. After choosing the three professions of War God, Law Saint and Sword Immortal, you can experience the fun of fighting monsters and upgrading, fighting BOSS to drop equipment, everything can be obtained in the game.

name: Brick Force: Black Knight
description: Get rid of those old rags and slip into the shining armor of the Black Knight!

name: Brick Force: Navy Soldier
description: Join the elite of the elite and feel like a real covert operator with the Navy Soldier Pack - just don't whine when you get your anchor tattoo!

name: Naval Action: Santa Ana
description: Santa Ana is a premium consumable second rate ship of the line designed by a famous Spanish naval engineer Romero Landa.

name: Naval Action: Travel Balloon
description: The first flying vessel made of a globe of taffeta filled with air and an attached basket

name: Naval Action: Navy Connection
description: Expand your docks, More outposts, More tow requests, More contracts What else does the Captain need?

name: Naval Action: Trincomalee
description: Oh the beautiful Trincomalee. The ultimate chase ship.

name: Naval Action: Rättvisan
description: Naval Action - Rättvisan is a powerful and agile 4th rate ship of the line.

name: Naval Action: Hercules
description: First flagship of the Argentinian Navy. Sturdy, fast and powerful.

name: Naval Action: Painter
description: Painter DLC is a consumable premium item that will give you access to all available ship paints in game.

name: Naval Action: Admiralty Connection
description: Use your patronage to the admiralty to receive access to additional warehousing space, building permits and dock space.

name: Naval Action: HMS Victory 1765
description: HMS Victory. The oldest naval warship in commission. Built as in 1765 with original figurehead and decorated stern gallery. Designed by Slade one of the best naval architects of the age of sail era.

name: Naval Action: Leopard
description: Leopard is a beautiful fast 4th rate that served during French revolutionary wars, Napoleonic wars and the War of 1812 between United States and Britain.

name: Naval Action: L'Hermione
description: Concorde class medium frigate giving you agility and firepower.

name: Naval Action: Redoutable
description: Redoutable is a Téméraire class 74-gun ship of the line. She fought against HMS Victory and 2 other ships during the Battle of Trafalgar, killing Vice Admiral Horatio Nelson during the action. She sank in the storm that followed the battle.

name: Naval Action: Le Requin
description: Le Requin is a perfect ship for hit and run operations and privateering. She can operate both from deep water and shallow water ports. Large crew allows you board enemies with confidence, and lateen sails profiles will help you escape from most dangers.

name: Sensual Adventures: The Game
description: Brittany and Trinity are back in a new game from Puppetmaster! The girls are stuck in the apartment until their flight to Cairo and there's only one thing to do until then... mess around anywhere and everywhere.

name: Synthalgia: Retro Arcade Racing
description: Synthalgia is an arcade racing game set in the summers of the 1980’s. Drive dangerously, drive fast, earn credits, buy and upgrade cars all while jamming out to 80’s inspired music in a neon retrofuturistic world of fast cars, beaches and bright lights!

name: Ice Cream Truck
description: Screech, halt! Max and his ice cream truck reach an unfamiliar universe never seen before. Continue making your way as you go after the little kid’s balloon. Solve mysteries with emotion-flavored ice cream. Will you be able to retrieve the kid’s lost balloon?

name: Finders Reapers: Super Crazy Character Pack
description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Monsters & Icons character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.

name: Finders Reapers: Legends & Sports Character Pack
description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Legends & Sports character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.

name: Finders Reapers: Evil & Nasty Character Pack
description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Monsters & Icons character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.

name: Finders Reapers: Attack & Defend Character Pack
description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Monsters & Icons character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.

name: Survive Into Night
description: Stay alive by any means as you face hunger, thirst, limited supplies, and consistent threats from both the living and undead. Sneak and Hide quietly to avoid the undead, or blast your way through the hordes with guns out, making every bullet count. Help other survivors to earn resources for crafting, or let the weak fend for themselves - You'll face the consequences of your choices.

name: Escherion
description: Embark upon a journey into an inescapable multidimensional prison deep beneath the Underworld. Rediscover the lost secrets of the Ancients and explore the Multiverse.

name: Warage: Necromancer Campaign
description: 14 missions in which you can fight on the side of the undead against the kingdoms of Abreim.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Volokonovka 1942
description: Volokonovka 1942 is an addon for Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star, which adds a new summer area of operations - Volokonovka village and new operations for the Red Army and Wehrmacht during Operation Blau (July 1942).

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Krasnaya Polyana 1943
description: Occupy positions in the Krasnaya Polyana village and break out of the encirclement in the area of Zmiyev en route to Kharkov.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Sokolovo 1943
description: Sokolovo 1943 is an addon for Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star, which adds new winter area of operations near the Sokolovo village and new operation for the Red Army (1st Czechoslovak Battalion) in March 1943, 15 turns.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Operation Hooper
description: New battle area - Angola, Cuito-Cuanavale district

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Edge of Storm
description: Battered troops of the 38 A are making a fighting retreat under pressure of the Wehrmacht's 6 A and 17 A south of Kharkov. Among them: 169 RD, 199 RD and 14 TBde which has lost more than 50% of personnel and most of its heavy weapons in previous battles.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - The Day of the Olifant
description: Military clash between Angolans and SADF during Bush War in 1987. Joint attack of two SADF battlegroups on the strong point of the Angolan army near the highway on Cuito-Cuanavale.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Final Offensive
description: Units of 4 gds MC broke through the enemy defenses in a small area near Kalinovka village. German infantry and airfield divisions hold two strong points on the flanks of the attacking group. 2 gds MC, 3 and 31 gds RC are preparing to assault them.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Typhoon Rising
description: At 7:30 September 30, after a 30 minute artillery barrage the German 24TAC main forces went on the offensive known as Operation Typhoon against the units of the Group of General Ermakov, thus preempting the beginning of the Soviet attack on Glukhov scheduled for the middle of the day.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Black Snow
description: The attack group of 8 A, reinforced with tank breakthrough regiments, is preparing to break through the enemy defense in the area near village Karbusel. German 223 ID occupies the defensive line, dense of engineer installations, developed system of trenches and obstacles, along with minefields.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Grim of Death
description: The attack group of 8 A, reinforced by a tank battalion, is preparing to break through the enemy defense in the area near village Vinyagolovo. German 96 ID holds the defensive line along the bank of the Mga river.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Furtive Spring
description: The March operation of 38A in the Chuguev-Andreevka area, south-east of Kharkov. The Red Army units are moving through German defensive positions and crossed the r.Severskiy Donets on a broad front. The Germans are retreating, abandoning weapons and vehicles.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Strong Point
description: The attack group 605 RR, 232 RD is preparing to force the Don river, near the mouth of the r.Veduga and break through the enemy defense line Gubarevo - svfm Opornyy Punkt. German 387 ID holds a defensive line on the right bank of the Don river.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Croatian Legion
description: First days of the German operation "Blau" in the summer of 1942 in the Oskol river area. Composite detachment of 13 TC is trying to assist the retreating Soviet rifle divisions, hitting the advancing enemy forces - 369 Croatian reinforced infantry regiment - from the flank.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Cold Spring
description: The offensive operation of 38A from South-Western Front on Kharkov, in May 1942. The Red Army units break through the German defenses in the area of the villages Peschanoe and Nepokrytaya. German units retreat and hastily transfer reserves to this sector of the front line.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Raid
description: The German 320 ID is preparing to break through the encirclement and escape to Kharkov. Armored group of the 2nd MIR LSAH follows to the rescue. Soviet 111 RD reinforced by a ski battalion are trying to hold the encirclement and prevent 320 ID from connecting with own forces.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Fateful Strike
description: Finale of the Soviet operation to seize Kharkov in May 1942. The Red Army units are slowly moving through German defensive positions with the aim of closing the encirclement around Kharkov. The main strike force is introduced into the battle - the newly created Soviet 21 and 23 tank corps.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Leopard's Leap
description: Military clash between the Angolan army and SADF/SWATF during the Bush War in 1987. A battlegroup of the 32nd SADF and 101st SWATF battalions ambushes the forward elements of the Angolan 21st brigade, along with the first combat use of the Ratel ZT3 ATGM.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Operation Moduler
description: Military clash between Angolans and SADF during Bush War in 1987. On dawn of October 3, the SADF tactical groups and UNITA forces launched an attack on Angolan 47th Brigade.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Against the Tide
description: Battle south-west of Kharkov after its liberation in August 1943. The Soviet 5th gds TA and 53A are trying to break through the German defenses in the area of village Korotich, saturated with anti-tank weapons and reinforced with Panther tanks.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Dark Forest
description: 53A units conduct stubborn fighting against the German 11AC units west of Kharkov. An exposed seam between 3TD and 168ID units was revealed in the forest south of Polevoe. 252RD, supported by tanks, is preparing to launch a decisive offensive at the junction of German units.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Dawn of Blau
description: First days of the German operation "Blau" in the summer of 1942 in the Oskol river area. Exhausted Red Army forces are in heavy combat with the enemy infantry and tanks rushing to the crossing. Two operations in hilly plains with harsh terrain and extensive gullies.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Drive on Voronezh
description: Intending to enter Voronezh from the south, on July 4, 1942, units of the German 24 TD crossed the Don river without heavy equipment and began advancing in the direction of Voronezh. 232 RD and 110 TBde were to stand in the breach.

name: Star Conflict: Scylla. Deluxe Version
description:
This DLC includes:
Empire engineering frigate “Scylla”.
EM weapon “Energoplasmer”
Active module “Farstation”
CPU modifier “Improved repair algorithms”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
Unique paint “Metal fatigue”.

Additionally, the pilot receives:
Mass Shield Generator.
Nanodrone Cloud.
Energy Emitter.
Autonomous Repair Station.

name: Gun Club VR: SWAT DLC
description: SWAT DLC puts you to the test as you master the weapons and tactics needed to become the best of the best. Hone your skills in the intense combat training simulations, face off against waves of hostile targets, and survive the onslaught of the apocalyptic zombie horde.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - American Sea Captain Character
description: It’s mari-time for mayhem! Josiah, a mischievous sailor, made himself invaluable to the Resistance when he deployed field troops on daring raids across the Mediterranean. Now, he does his part in the zombie kill squads of Italy!

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Renegade Officer Character
description: Loyalty to the Fuhrer? Not likely! Werner Sauer was a legend throughout the Afrika Korps for his bravery under fire, but when he put a lethal end to an occult ritual conducted by an SS Officer, he was sent to a penal battalion as punishment.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - French Resistance Fighter Character
description: Vive la résistance! A survivor who lost her family to the Nazi scourge, Marie knows the real horror of World War 2 started long before the undead emerged. One of France’s most feared guerilla fighters, she eventually joined the team that ended Hitler’s horrifying Plan Z and never stopped fighting to rid Europe of the undead menace!

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Paratrooper Zombie Character
description: It’s time to drop in and unleash hell! When Captain Hector Jennings crashed in the Alps, he left behind more than his life in the snow. With a Paratrooper outfit salvaged from the wreckage of his aircraft, the Undead Airman himself is ready to slay in style and tear apart the undead that snatched his mortality from him in the first place!

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Undead Airman Character
description: When Plan Z was unleashed, millions of soldiers rose from the dead – but not everyone came back as a mindless ghoul! Hector crashed in the Alps during the Dead War, and isn’t going to let that whole ‘being dead’ thing get in the way of his duty as a gentleman! Just try not to catch yourself on the propeller blade sticking out of his chest.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Left 4 Dead Character Pack 1
description: The four characters from Left 4 Dead join the Resistance in this free Character Pack!

name: Code: Star Dungeon
description: A multi-role roguelike independent game that needs to collect characters to form a team. Focus on the player's mastery of attacks and skills.

name: Red Algorithm: Osiris
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Shadowfell Conspiracy - Collector's Edition
description: About the Collector’s Edition Includes The Shadowfell Conspiracy Expansion Pack plus instant access to Purple Dragon Knight Iconic Hero: A stalwart Fighter, cut loose from active service, who can lead the charge with rallying battle-cries.

name: Pixel Art: Mash-Up
description: Level up your skills while fighting your way through waves of chaos. Levels are generated at the start of every game and will be different each time you play.

name: Smash Up: Awesome Level 9000
description: Add four new totally awesome factions to your Smash Up collection with murderous Killer Plants, mighty Bear Cavalry, spooky Ghosts and inventive Steampunks!

name: Dead or Alive 6: Rachel & Debut Costume Set
description: This set includes Rachel and the set of 5 debut costumes for her.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel - Shining Pom Bait Pack 2
description: This pack contains 3 consumable baits that, when used, will lure out an elusive Shining Pom. Defeating these rare creatures in battle will reward a massive amount of EXP, helping your party reach new heights. Once used, they will disappear from your inventory.

name: Mansions of Madness: Altered Fates
description: Lady Helena, the woman who hired you, is abducted through a polychromatic portal before your eyes! With the portal closing and only moments to act, you must decide who will follow into the unknown. Will you be able to work together even while torn apart?

name: The Eye of Borrack: Tangled Tales
description:
Ever wondered what else goes on in the strange setting that surrounds the tale of Borrack? Well, now you can.

Play Tangled Tales as either Cinderella or Prince Charming as you attempt to find your way back to the family castle in time for your friend's wedding, encountering all manner of rude, annoying and often unhelpful fairy tale folk, intent it seems, on hindering you.

name: Glass Masquerade: Halloween Puzzle Pack
description: The Halloween Puzzle Pack contains 5 new puzzles across the globe, including free 'Ireland' demo puzzle.

name: CityRunner
description: Stay alive in CityRunner as you take to the streets of the city, a challenging Near Future Sci-Fi based Platform-Style Runner game. Set the highscore by collecting pickups and powerups and staying alive as long as possible to gain the high-score.

name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - Happily Ever After
description: The end is near... One final adventure of Charles de Maure is upon you! Dive into the intrigues between French nobility and British intelligence, reclaim your greatest prize and marry the woman you love!

name: Duck Boy
description: Immerse yourself in stunning locales and discover unique abilities as you navigate the lost world of Avenis and it's many secrets.

name: Terminal Conflict: Flower Power Upgrade Pack
description: Includes the all the goodies from the Terminal Conflict: Commander in Chief Edition; includes the Flower Power Terminal (cosmetic), Steam Achievement, Unique Leaders, Policies, and Decisions.

name: Hotel Renovation 2
description: This Hotel remembers better times. But thanks to you, they can come back. Renew the rooms. Plan the furniture. Upgrade rooms. Now is the time to reopen and count your profits.

name: Xol
description: Ball meets cubes. A love story in the making. And a tough Isometric Physics Platformer.

name: LuLu Looking For Dogs
description: LuLu Looking For Dogs is a horizontal action platform game. LuLu embarks on a journey to save her dog. On this dangerous journey, you will guide LuLu across traps, avoid enemy attacks, unlock the switch, and finally rescue her pet dog.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Blazing Guns
description: The appearance of the first tanks on the battlefields led to a global change of the principles of the warfare.The tactic of using tanks was improved more and more and their number has steadily grown since the day of the battle on Somme in 1916 and till the end of the combat actions.

name: XXZ: XXL - Dead Souls
description: A married couple is going to fight against pretty Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

name: Seiso Master KEN
description: A 2D action game full of speed. Various playable characters go through the flames and aim for whales.

name: Skyjunk
description: Blast and slash your way across the sky in this action roguelite. Armed with your grappling hook and an array of ingenious weapons and gadgets, contend with a mechanized army in procedurally generated levels.

name: Polyforce WW2
description: Polyforce WW2 is the Online First-Person Shooter game that describes the World War 2. In Polyforce WW2, you can choose the Axis and Allied side, and you can see and experience how destructive the war was!

name: Levaluhta
description: Levaluhta, an exquisite black and white graphics game, is an Eldercare noir horror story set in Orismala, Finland. It's dynamic modern gameplay is inspired by classic adventure and horror games.

name: Cube Full of Mines: Slate Map
description: Peaceful serenity is threatened by a Cube Full of Mines. This DLC contains one brand new selectable theme to play. Experience the same gameplay you love from Cube Full of Mines in a brand new environment... Slate!

name: TrackMaster: Free For All Motorsport
description: TrackMaster is an all-terrain, all-vehicles, physics based sandbox and racing game: play whatever way you want, in any kind of track and event, with any vehicle!

name: Blood Code: Costume Pack
description: This Costume Pack contains 4 costumes with bonus effects.

name: Crazy Ball Adventures: Treasure
description: Crazy Ball Adventures: Treasure is a 3D gravity balance ball game. You will experience a combination of puzzle and game entertainment. This DLC features a different gameplay to the Crazy Ball series. The player's goal is to collect stars in a short period of time. There is a minimum number of stars required to be collected in order to pass each level.

name: Beats Fever: Big Apple
description: Big Apple is the first DLC for the acclaimed VR music game Beats Fever. This pack contains the new urban stage of New York and 10 new music levels.

name: World of Fantasy: Zero
description: World of Fantasy is a round action Stratigie game with crafting system and you can get in gear crystals puregive to make them even stronger it also has a day-night system

name: Hyperspace: Andy's Adventure - Metal Universe
description: Metal Universe is a DLC with completely new theme, immersive atmosphere, great rhythm feel and a new genre. Come and get ready to rock!

name: Train Simulator 2021: Montana Hi-Line - Shelby: Havre Route
description: The eastern segment of BNSF's famed and busy Hi-Line Subdivision crosses the magnificent and fertile high plains of Montana - and the remarkable experiences of railroading in America's "Big Sky Country" now comes to Train Simulator 2021 with the Montana Hi-Line route!

name: Pathfinder Adventures: Rise of the Goblins
description: The Rise of the Goblins takes place in an alternate version of the Rise of the Runelords, where the heroes are the Goblins and the villains are the heroes. Goblins Only!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Wrath of the Damned
description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf is a card-driven turn-based tactical game which features RPG elements, containing a single player campaign, survival and PvP modes. Win these battles using the arsenal of weapons, abilities and cunning of the sky warriors. The Wrath of the Damned DLC includes a new PvE arena marking the next step in the evolution of the acclaimed The Fall of Kanak mode, new heroes, and a new set of cards for the main game and new achievements.

name: The Surge 2: Future Shock Weapon Pack
description: Expand your The Surge 2 experience with the Future Shock Weapon Pack and get access to 4 new devastating weapons from the shadiest corners of Jericho City. The quarantine has sparked a surge in black market activities that unearthed previously secret projects.

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Infernal Dungeons
description: The Infernal Dungeons DLC opens up another world that you can travel to when you go through the Gate. Fight ghastly creatures like gnolls, gargoyles, and the lich in a truly "dungeon" type of world. NOTE: You must unlock the base game to load this expansion pack.

name: The Arcadia of Wulin
description: The Arcadia Of Wulin is a relaxed and casual individual independent game with the theme of construction and management. In the game, you will create a beautiful and prosperous paradise from nothing. Carefully plan each building, so that the building will have a sense of heaven and earth, so that the residents living here can comprehend the peerless martial arts. Here are the masters from outside the world, and here are the knights who return to hermit.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Western Sichuan Pass: Dujiangyan - Maoxian & Mashancun Route Add-On
description: The Western Sichuan Pass delivers unique mountainside passenger operations throughout the Sichuan province of Southwest China, and is brought to life, courtesy of Partner Programme developer, Simtech Vision.

name: Game Tengoku CruisinMix Special: Clarice
description: Clarice, the heroine of Jaleco's City Connection/Cruisin, flies (drives?) into action with this DLC. A new character, exclusive music track and new entry to the Data Mode HD library are yours to enjoy!

name: Heroes of Normandie: 21st Panzer Division
description: Heroes of Normandie: 21st Panzer Division is the second expansion for the acclaimed and fast paced tactical game Heroes of Normandie. Lead many new units from the tough german 21st Panzer Division and show those Yankees that you mean business!

name: Table Top Racing: World Tour - Tropical Ice Pack
description: Table Top Racing continues its world tour with the all-new Tropical Ice Pack. Introducing two new and exciting locations; 'Life's A Beach' the Brazilian juice bar and the luxury Alpine resort, 'Yellowsnow Piste'.

name: Microcosmum: Survival of Cells - Campaign "Hot and Cold"
description: We present you a new additional campaign of 50 missions. Temperature fluctuations appeared in the microcosmum. Now microorganisms slow down in cold areas and accelerate in warm ones. Use it in your tactics!

name: Tower!2011:SE - Orlando KMCO Airport
description: Orlando International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends Complete Edition - Powerful Weapon Pack
description: 12 additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new powerful versions of all 77 weapon types will be available to acquire.

name: Goliath: Summertime Gnarkness
description: The first DLC expansion for Goliath adds four new Goliath types, Epic Weapons and more - all for free!

name: Tropico 4: Complete DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead in Vinland: Endless Mode - Battle of the Heodenings
description: Named after the tale of an endless battle from Norse mythology, this second DLC for Dead In Vinland unlocks a new Endless, sandboxy, survival mode!

name: Europa Universalis IV: Ultimate Unit Pack
description:
The Ultimate Unit Pack for Europa Universalis IV!

Includes:
Indian Subcontinent Unit Pack
Native Americans II Unit Pack
Muslim Ships Unit Pack
Indian Ships Unit Pack
Colonial British and French Unit Pack
Catholic League Unit Pack
Conquistadors Unit Pack
Trade Nations Unit Pack
Evangelical Union Unit Pack

name: Dimension Shift
description: Get ready for a challenge! Dimension Shift is a hardcore game for hardcore gamers. Avoid the spikes. Reach the end. It's that simple. Or is it...?

name: Master of Orion 1+2
description: Sin descripción

name: Muslim 3D
description: Muslim 3D is an educational video game. You begin your journey in a virtual place in the city of Makkah. Interact with other, virtual people, go on adventurous quests, go back in time to relive a historic moment, or perform a Virtual Hajj!

name: Gratuitous Space Battles: The Parasites
description: If you catch them at the wrong time the parasites are a race to be reckoned with. Every 200 years or so they travel the galaxy looking for new hosts, and we're not suggesting that this is a race that excels at making people feel welcome at parties.

name: The Abnormal Place
description: The Abnormal Place is a game about Abigail, a young woman who has lost her voice and has found herself in a strange resort and hotel inhabited by monsters. Abigail must recover her voice and navigate through the hostile world or she'll be forever trapped.

name: Pray in VR Medieval Christian Churches
description: The epidemic prevented us from going to church to pray. But we still have a way to pray. In the VR church, hold the cross in your hands, listen to sacred music, and pray to God. A private space for your soul!

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Nyaa Invaders 1
description: About Alien cats are hungry and ready to invade the earth. If you fly the most advanced cat lunch box spaceship, you must feed them before they starve. Save the earth!

name: Robot Rogue
description: Robot Rogue is a turn-based roguelike game featuring skill system. You have 3 skills and each skill have own attack area, attack damage, and cost of use. Cast a best skill on situation, and clear the dungeon!

name: Wars Across the World: Fornovo 1495
description: Fornovo 1495 is the story of the first 'War of Italy', with the expedition of French king Charles VIII against Naples. The French objective is to capture the key city of Naples and keep it against their adversaries.

name: Guild of Dungeoneering: Pirates Cove Adventure Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Soaring Tales of Skylines
description: After Hong Kong's coup in the 1960s, the economy began to develop, and you have this golden opportunity to develop real estate!

name: Hyper Knights: Challenges
description: Challenge yourself and climb the leaderboards in these cool unique challenges!

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Overlord Scenario Pack
description: Conquer your foes in exciting new single-player scenarios that will test your strategy and skill. Then explore new maps that range from 2 player skirmishes all the way up to large, 6-player rumbles.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Secret Missions
description: Sin descripción

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Epic Map Pack
description: Play with half a dozen new maps and a new scenario in this first content pack for Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation.

name: AI War: DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Caveblazers: Arena Mode
description: The Arena Expansion for Caveblazers introduces a ridiculous new game mode. Fight your way through waves of deadly monsters in a variety of fully destructible stages! Collect packs of cards as you level up in the arena - complete with a fancy pack opening animation!

name: Nerdland
description: Two best friends (Paul Rudd & Patton Oswalt) make a last ditch effort to become famous, stumbling into a series of misadventures that threaten their lives and dignity.

name: Diamond Hunter
description: A mystery adventure game where you will need to use your orientation skills to avoid getting lost in the mazes.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Quinnimont Coal Drag
description: This package includes the "C&O 2-6-6-6 H8" locomotive and a brand new detailed session. Quinnimont was a marshaling yard for coal loads from the surrounding mines. Trains were assembled here to be shipped to Clifton Forge and beyond. Empty cars were also made-up here for the mines in the area.

name: Dungeon Fighter Online: Dynasty Guardian Pack
description: A special DLC: from Dynasty Guardian avatars to steam exclusive aura avatar, the package contains various useful CERA items! This offer will be available for a limited period of time.

name: No Turning Back: The Pixel Art Action-Adventure Roguelike - Potions Starter Pack
description: Every time you start a new game you will have access to a selection of 3 randomly generated potions to pick.

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny - With Blade and Brilliance
description: Celebrating the two year anniversary of Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny, Crafty Studios is proud to present an eventful blend of extra content - for free.

name: Don't Miss the King
description: Dont miss the king is a strategy-platformer game that lets you strategize while you are in battle. You will be able to fight using different types of soldiers on many different maps in this game where you have to defeat a dark wizard-king who is trying to take all of humanity under his will.

name: Aircraft War: Space Wars
description: New DLC has been added to Aircraft War. With this DLC pack, the war has been moved into space. You will fight with your own spaceships against enemy space warships. Space Wars are waiting for you.

name: Realms of Arkania 1+2
description: Sin descripción

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Ice Class
description: Ice is basically a disabling damage dealer. Nearly all of his spells will slow enemy movement but his spells also leave him more vulnerable.

name: Flight of the Amazon Queen: Legacy Edition
description: The Legacy Edition of "Flight of the Amazon Queen", using latest ScummVM software to run on modern platforms (Windows, macOS and Linux).

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Revenge of the Snathi
description: The Snathi have risen from the ashes of their Precursor prison world. Lead this evil new empire of bloodthirsty squirrels to galactic domination in sandbox and their own campaign.

name: Commandos 2+3
description: Sin descripción

name: M.A.X. + M.A.X. 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Empires Complete Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Interstellar Space: Genesis - Natural Law
description: Interstellar Space: Genesis - Natural Law is an expansion to the turn-based space 4X strategy game Interstellar Space: Genesis. Features 2 new races, equipped with unique new capabilities, also usable by custom races. Also, 9 new fully animated ruler options, 4 new music tracks, and 4 new leaders!

name: Armored Brigade Nation Pack: Czechoslovakia - Netherlands
description: Czechoslovakia and Netherlands enter the arena of Armored Brigade. This expansion of this real-time tactical wargame adds two factions and a new map. The playable Nations have different army compositions and organizational structures, giving more complexity to the game.

name: Betrayal at Krondor Pack
description: This Betrayal pack includes two games: Betrayal at Krondor and Betrayal in Antara.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Lord of Skulls
description: Sin descripción

name: Data East Arcade Pack #1
description: Sin descripción

name: BattleTech: Urban Warfare
description: Urban Warfare brings 'Mech combat to the vast cityscapes of the Inner Sphere! Electronic warfare, large-scale building destruction, environmental mechanics, new enemy units and more make the urban sprawl a whole new battlefield.

name: X4: Cradle of Humanity
description: X4: Cradle of Humanity, the second big expansion for X4: Foundations, significantly increases the size of the game's universe with new sectors, story missions and game-starts, while also welcoming two Terran factions, along with their economy, ships, weapons and stations.

name: Wars Across the World: Innsmouth 1928
description: Innsmouth 1928 is a simulation of the assault of the Police, FBI and U.S.Coast Guard and National Guard on the degenerate town of Innsmouth, populated by monstrous creatures. This is a mod on the Ctulluh universe.

name: Wars Across the World: Coral Sea 1942
description: Coral Sea 1942 covers the May 1942 Japanese invasion attempt of New Guinea, and the air and naval campaigns around it. The Japanese forces must capture Port Moresby and establish bases in the Solomon islands, but their offensive could be well stopped by the Allies naval and air forces.

name: Wars Across the World: Burma 1942
description: Burma 1942 is the recreation of the Japanese onslaught against Burma in the first months of 1942. Four Japanese divisions, supported by their Thai allies must conquer the whole of Burma before Monsoon sets in.

name: Wars Across the World: Bouvines 1214
description: Bouvines 1214 tells the War of 1213-1214 between crown of France against a coalition of England, Flanders and Holy Roman Empire. The French must consolidate their gains and punish the rebel Count of Flanders. The Coalition needs to spread out French forces, defeat them and stop the rise of France.

name: Wars Across the World: Kippur 1973
description: Kippur 1973 allows to replay the Arab-Israeli war of October 1973. The Arab side, mostly Egypt and Syria, attacks Israeli troops by surprise simultaneously in the Sinai and the Golan, to get a foothold again on their land claims. Israel must hold and then counter-attack to obtain victory.

name: Wars Across the World: Soccer 1969
description: Soccer 1969 relates the 'Soccer War' that opposed Honduras and Salvador in July 1969 following a very tense football game. The Salvadoran army sets up an offensive with the aim of overthrowing Honduras president, accused of spoliation against Salvadorian immigrants.

name: Wars Across the World: Uganda 1979
description: Uganda 1979 is the depiction of the last offensive of megalomaniac tyrant of Uganda, Amin Dada, against his neighbour Tanzania from 1978. The Ugandans must hold the province of Kagera and repel the enemy offensive. Tanzanians must first and foremost overthrow Amin Dada by capturing his capital.

name: Wars Across the World: Korea 1592
description: Korea 1592 relates the story of the Imjin War, the toughest conflict in the end of the 16th century in Asia, depicting the invasion of the Joeson kingdom of Korea by the Samurai armies of Japan's master, Hideyoshi.

name: Wars Across the World: Columbus 1492
description: Columbus 1492 retraces the exceptional and tragic journey of the discoverer of America, Christopher Columbus. You will discover the unknown, build colonies and search for gold. Opposition will be great, between storms, mutinies and natives, not to mention many other pitfalls on the road to glory...

name: Wars Across the World: Galicia 1914
description: Galicia 1914 is the story of the first weeks of the Great War between Russia and Austria-Hungary. Three Austrian armies (plus one soon coming from Serbia) are initially deployed against 4 armies of the Czar. Can Austria-Hungary keep the control of Galicia in front of the Russian steamroller?

name: Wars Across the World: Nordwind 1945
description: Nordwind 1945 is the last German offensive in the west. By New Year's eve, the Germans enter Alsace from the north and try to reach Saverne,pushing back American and French forces. Can the Allies contain and then repulse their enemy, in the midst of one of the most severe winter of the period in the area?

name: Wars Across the World: Illyria 229
description: Illyria 229 BC. Rome is looking eastward. In the Adriatic Sea, Illyrian pirates wage terror and their exactions push Rome to intervene. The Illyrians must capture a maximum of Greek cities while avoiding being crushed by Roman Legions and ships.

name: Wars Across the World: Franche-Comté 1636
description: Franche-Comté 1636 takes place during the so-called Ten Years' war, in the Modern era. The Franche-Comté player has to repel the French and Weimarian assaults by defending strategic places. This scenario allows Francs-Comtois to win by a diplomatic victory later in the game, via a peace treaty.

name: Wars Across the World: Serbia 1914
description: Serbia 1914 simulates the Austro-Hungarian offensives against Serbia and Montenegro during the first month of WW1, in the Balkans. Three Austrian armies must crush Serbian forces and capture Belgrade. The Serbians are powerful, but their resources are scarce, whether to resist...or counter-attack!

name: Carcassonne: The Official Board Game - The Princess & the Dragon
description: Carcassonne: The Princess & the Dragon is an expansion for Carcassonne: The Official Board Game. Check out the rampaging Dragon Meeple: move it so he can eat up your opponents' Meeples... Unless he eats you first and ruins all your plans! Ask for help from the Fairy Meeple. She will protect you from the Dragon, and not just that - she will use her fairy magic to give you bonus points! Have fun with new tiles: the Magic portals. Teleport your Meeples to other tiles using the Magic portals. As for the Princess, all the Meeples will fight to join her ranks: if there's a Princess in the city, remove all rival Meeples to try to become the knight of the city!

name: Wars Across The World: Levant 1941
description: Levant 1941 is the Second World War in the Middle East. The British Empire must successively crush the coup in Iraq, seize Vichy France-held Syria and Lebanon, before finally entering Iran to set up a supply route to the Soviet Union. The Axis must do its utmost to prevent this strict schedule.

name: Space Shooter
description: Become the best spaceship pilot with Space Shooter which is an arcade game that can quickly wake up your hardworking side

name: Little Big Workshop: The Evil
description: The Evil DLC expands on what makes Little Big Workshop great! Your factory is turning profits week after week but you still feel unfulfilled? Then it’s time to crank the corporate greed dial all the way to sinister! Bladh will be thrilled.

name: OMSI 2: Wuppertal
description: On the road in Wuppertal: With the new OMSI 2 Add-on Wuppertal you now have the opportunity to discover the “large green city” with lots of realistically modelled buildings along 21 km of route.

name: OMSI 2: Grand Paris-Moulon
description: Bienvenue en France! We are heading back to France. The Add-on Grand Paris Moulon - With the Express 91.06 through France from developer Creations AgoraS-114 plays in the area south of Paris.

name: OMSI 2: Düsseldorf
description: Experience the North Rhine-Westphalian regional capital with two Urbino IV versions on routes for five accessible bus lines – amongst others the metrobus line M3. Pass skyscrapers and drive through the daily rush hour in the midst of the city.

name: OMSI 2: Vienna 2 - Line 23A
description: Have you ever dreamt of being a bus driver? Well, now you can take your seat behind the steering wheel of faithfully recreated service buses of the “Wiener Linien”!

name: OMSI 2: HafenCity - Hamburg Modern
description: On the road again in the Hanseatic city! With two modern hybrid buses, the OMSI 2 add-on “HafenCity – Hamburg modern” takes you along two new lines through the “Speicherstadt” (warehouse district) and “HafenCity” (HarbourCity).

name: OMSI 2: E-Bus Hamburg
description: Vision becomes reality – after the first battery electric buses of the type eCitaro have been standardly put in operation in Hamburg in summer 2018, this modern city bus now finds its way into OMSI 2 as well.

name: OMSI 2: Hamburg
description: OMSI: Hamburg is an add-on for OMSI - The Bus Simulator for PC. Drive your 40ft city bus from the 1990s in multiple versions on the authentic Hamburg bus line 109 and 688.

name: OMSI 2: OmniNavigation
description: The navigation system clearly shows you your current route and your current location. So you don't need the often confusing OMSI 2 help arrows anymore and you can easily find the right way at every intersection.

name: OMSI 2: Citybus 628c & 628g LF
description: Citybus 628c & 628g LF – add-on for OMSI 2 depicting realistic buses manufactured in Turkey, dedicated to Middle-East Europe, cheaper version of bus called a o530 produced in Germany.

name: OMSI 2: VanHool Generationen Reihe
description: With the new and complimentary DLC „VanHool Generationen Reihe“ we get the forgotten coach series of VanHool on your harddrive. Twelve different busses are in the pack included.

name: OMSI 2: Bremen-Nord
description: Following the OMSI add-ons Berlin X10 and Rheinhausen, the third OMSI routes add-on from Halycon Media takes players to the beautiful city of Bremen in northern Germany.

name: OMSI 2: München City
description: „The heartfelt cosmopolitan city“! With the new OMSI 2 add-on München City players will be driving modern MAN Lion's City buses through central Munich with some of its scenic boroughs like Schwabing, Maxvorstadt, Lehel, Haidhausen and Bogenhausen.

name: OMSI 2: Chicago Downtown
description: Catch a fresh breeze for OMSI 2: Chicago is the third largest city of the U.S. and delivers an unique scenario with completely new vehicles and scenery objects. Welcome to "Windy City" at Lake Michigan!

name: OMSI 2: Citybus O305G
description: The „Citybus O305G“ allows you to take a journey through time. The „Citybus O305G “ as a pure vehicle add-on aims to build a virtual monument for the articulated pusher busses of the first generation and sends you right back in the early 1980s.

name: OMSI 2: Hamburger Buspaket
description: The vehicle expansion “Hamburg Buses” adds three of Hamburg’s city buses from the latest 2017 generation to OMSI. This includes the 21 metre long large-capacity articulated bus with 4 axles as well as the solo and articulated variants with 12 and 13 metres, respectively.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.8 - KI-Menschen
description: In the 8th part of the OMSI 2 download pack series, the variety becomes even greater, because more AI humans are waiting to be released into the maps. In addition, the pack offers new male and female bus drivers.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.3 - KI-Menschen
description: This third volume in the OMSI download pack series is dedicated to the passengers and other people encountered on OMSI maps. OMSI 2 Download Pack Vol. 3 contains people with 5 different body types and a large range of different characteristics and clothing styles.

name: OMSI 2: Studio Polygon Lite Pack
description: The Studio Polygon Lite Pack is a low-floor midibus introduced in 2010. It was originally available in only one body style, which is the wheel forward of the door, and was before the door forward of the wheel.

name: OMSI 2: Projekt Gladbeck
description: Hop on and be a bus driver on more than 35 recreated bus lines through cities like Gladbeck, Bottrop, Gelsenkirchen, Essen, Recklinghausen, Marl and Dortmund! Here´s the deal: 1,000 objects and buildings on 500km of accessible route - guaranteeing more than 2,000 hours of driving fun!

name: OMSI 2: Berlin BRT
description: Berlin BRT - Bus Rapid Transit is the new OMSI map for all Berlin lovers!

name: OMSI 2: Leitstellen-Simulator
description: Join a control center event as a bus driver at any time and be part of it! Work together with the control center to complete your shifts perfectly and get the passengers to their destination safely and on time.

name: OMSI 2: Wuppertal Buslinie 639
description: With the new OMSI 2 Mini DLC you expand Wuppertal by 6km mobile route through the mountains of the district Sonnborn. Here you connect with the new bus line 639 the mountainous regions of Wuppertal with the suspension railway, the S-Bahn station Zoologischer Garten and the green Wuppertal Zoo.

name: OMSI 2: Rheinhausen
description: Variety is the spice of life. And the OMSI 2 Add-On- Rheinhausen is certainly jam-packed with variety. As well as the challenges of driving a bus in urban traffic, virtual bus drivers also have tempting opportunities to manoeuvre a large vehicle safely through traffic on interurban routes.

name: OMSI 2: Düsseldorf - Linie 721
description: With the new OMSI 2 mini add-on you can expand the OMSI 2 Düsseldorf add-on route by another 17km drivable route across the city center with the line 721.

name: OMSI 2: Busbetrieb-Simulator
description: The Bus Company Simulator brings three brand-new features to OMSI 2: Single player and Multiplayer career modes, comprehensive company management and a sophisticated economy system.

name: OMSI 2: K-Bergbahn
description: The beautiful town „Zille“ is a tourist place in Sauerland. Especially many tourists from Lower Saxony and Ruhr district go there. They have the opportunity to spend a nice day or even a vacation in „Zille“.

name: OMSI 2: Masterbus Gen 3 Pack
description: This DLC is a pack of highly accurate renditions of the Wright Gemini 3 series of buses, including Streetdeck, B5TL, and B5LH variants.

name: OMSI 2: Saint-Servan
description: The OMSI 2-AddOn Saint-Servan presents 8 lines of this large network connecting the center of Saint-Servan with the districts and villages in the north of the metropolis (such as Salérin, Monfort-sur-Rhé, Le Roc Saint-André, etc.).

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.6 - KI-Menschen
description: A New AI people pack is back for OMSI 2 and this time they bring new bus drivers.

name: OMSI 2: Urbino Stadtbusfamilie
description: The add-on “Urbino Citybus Series” for OMSI 2 includes two 18 m articulated buses, two 12 m solo buses, and one 15 m three-axle solo bus.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.5 - KI-Menschen
description: Who is Sid Surley? Don’t worry, you’ll have a chance to meet the grouchy pensioner soon enough. Sid Surley and lots more new passengers are waiting to board in the OMSI 2 Add-on Downloadpack Vol. 5!

name: OMSI 2: Berlin X10
description: X10 Berlin - The express bus between City West and Brandenburg is the first add-on for "OMSI 2" created by the developers of Halycon. The modern Berlin out of the perspective of a bus driver is a captivating experience. It`s a challenge to take on the daily schedule without accidents.

name: OMSI 2: Luzern - Linie 24
description: Line 24 leads from the Lucerne main railway station across the lake bridge towards the traffic building to Meggen. At the crossing of the lake, passengers can admire the world-famous "Kapellbrücke" with its striking tower.

name: OMSI 2: Bad Hügelsdorf 2020
description: The Baden County in the southwest of Germany is considered one of the most scenic areas of the German republic. It is in this landscape that the OMSI2 add-on Bad Huegelsdorf 2020 plays.

name: OMSI 2: Express 91.06
description: The add-on "Express 91.06" is a semi-fictitious French map that will allow you to discover the express line 91.06. It starts at the bus station of Massy Palaiseau in France and allows you to cross a plateau inspired by the French Silicon Valley.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.4 - KI-Fahrzeuge
description: The 4th part of the popular OMSI2 download pack series supplies numerous service vehicles that every bus driver encounters daily.

name: OMSI 2: Citybus i260 Series
description: Citybus i260 - City bus of large capacity. This is a high-floor bus with 3 doors, engine in the center and rear wheel drive.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.2 - KI-Fahrzeuge
description: This second OMSI 2 download pack is all about utility vehicles in OMSI 2. It contains a total of nine different utility AI vehicles awaiting deployment on a diverse selection of OMSI maps, ranging from refuse collection trucks to multifunctional light trucks.

name: OMSI 2: Strassenbahn NF6D Essen/Gelsenkirchen
description: OMSI 2 premiere – Get on rails in the popular bus simulation at the Ruhr district for the first time. 15 tram stops (two of those subway stops) through challenging alleys from Essen to the broader streets of Gelsenkirchen.

name: OMSI 2: Doppelgelenkbus AGG 300
description: Drive extra large! Fully functional bi-articulated buses are now possible with OMSI 2.3. This add-on brings the 80-ft Van Hool true-to-life into your OMSI, based on real buses from Hamburg.

name: OMSI 2: Vienna 1 - Line 24A
description: Have you ever dreamt of being a bus driver? Well, now you can take your seat behind the steering wheel of faithfully recreated service buses of the “Wiener Linien”!

name: OMSI 2: Metropole Ruhr
description: „Metropole Ruhr“ is the most comprehensive OMSI add-on to date – featuring a map more than twice as large as the Project Gladbeck map. You can experience Germany’s largest metropolitan area on more than 800 km of drivable route, more than 50 bus lines in 15 Ruhr cities and along 2,000 custom buildings and objects as well as on a fully...

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol.9 - KI-Luxusautos
description: They are the eye-catchers in real road traffic: luxury cars. Now these noble cars are also available in the bus simulator OMSI 2.

name: OMSI 2: Vienna
description: A piece of history is back! Discover the busline 24A from Zentrum Kagran (U) to the outskirts of the town in the 22nd district of Vienna in the high-floor bus LU 200.

name: OMSI 2: Köln
description: As the biggest city in North Rhine-Westphalia, Cologne has an extensive public transit network. The city railway and bus lines are being operated by the Kölner Verkehrsbetriebe AG (KVB).

name: OMSI 2: Irisbus Intercity Pack
description: Discover the exiting collection of Irisbus coaches in OMSI 2. This collection includes seven coaches in the range, ranging in length from 10.6 meters to 12.8 meters, with a rich customization, ideal for your school or peri-urban trips.

name: OMSI 2: City Bus O305
description: Relive the history of the German omnibuses on your computer at home and explore the technology of the Citybus O305. Do not only drive a bus with automatic transmission, but be the first in an OMSI add-on to control a bus with manual transmission in the busy city traffic.

name: OMSI 2: Mallorca
description: The omnibus simulator captures the famous holiday island! With the OMSI 2 Add-on Mallorca the player can experience the popular beach region on the Balearic Islands along the Platja de Palma cities Palma, Can Pastilla, El Molinar S’Arenal.

name: OMSI 2: Digibus Phantom
description: The Phantom is based on the high-floor version of the Optare Spectra, which first appeared on British roads in 1992 and is a modern evolution of the MCW Metrobus.

name: OMSI 2: Man DN95
description: Hardly any other bus has shaped the cityscape as much as the MAN DN95. This double-decker bus, originally called MAN ND202, belongs to Berlin like the Brandenburg Gate, the Reichstag or the TV tower.

name: OMSI 2: Three Generations
description: Take a seat and enjoy the ride - welcome to the articulated buses in Hamburg! "Three Generations" is the first add-on especially developed for OMSI 2 with not only new vehicles but a whole lot of new and unique features which as such have never before been available in OMSI 2.

name: OMSI 2: Velbert
description: With the new OMSI 2 add-on Velbert you have now the opportunity to explore another city in NRW in the heart of the Niederbergisches Land with 2 full bus lines. Over 200 new real buildings were developed especially for this add-on and make the city of Velbert look very realistic.

name: OMSI 2: Yorkshire Counties
description: Welcome to Yorkshire Counties, a Fictional Map inspired by the UK areas of Yorkshire. The map has tight roads and an even tighter Timetable this map will challenge even the most experienced OMSI Driver.

name: When the Lying Petals Scatter Into the Wind
description: A side story of visual novel "Flowers Blooming at the End of Summer".

name: Tank Warfare: Operation Pugilist
description: The battle of Mareth Line during the Tunisian campaign in 1943. British 50th Infantry Division supported by the Valentine tanks of the 50th Royal Tank Regiment is trying to break through the German defenses.

name: BattleTech: Heavy Metal
description: Heavy Metal unleashes a wide range of ‘Mechs that both longtime fans and new players can enjoy. Pilot seven classic BattleMechs along with one new ‘Mech designed exclusively for this expansion. Experience the mystery of a derelict cargo ship while attempting to take control of its payload in the new flashpoint mini-campaign and crank...

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Hunter/Prey
description: Sin descripción

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Worlds in Crisis
description: In Worlds in Crisis, you will encounter a host of new world events with ideological choices that you will have to resolve. Several new planet types and well over a dozen new planet features also await you.

name: Sin Slayers: Pharmacist
description: Sin descripción

name: Armored Brigade Nation Pack: France - Belgium
description: France and Belgium enter the arena of Armored Brigade. This expansion of this real-time tactical wargame adds two factions and a new map. The playable Nations have different army compositions and organizational structures, giving more complexity to the game.

name: Armored Brigade Nation Pack: Italy - Yugoslavia
description: A nation pack with two new factions: Italy and Yugoslavia. Over 250 new units and aircraft from the 1965-1991 era. Iconic modern equipment like the VCC-1 and SIDAM, or Praga SPAAG and M-84 MBT, but also plenty of venerable veterans like M4A3 Sherman, M36 Jackson or SU-100.

name: Dandara: Trials of Fear - Enhanced Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Aton
description:
A 1 vs. 1 Multiplayer Tower Defense/Offense Game with elements of Deck-Building.
It's a one-man indie game by bluewingtitan/Dominik Mezler and currently known to be in Alpha.

name: Through the Ages: New Leaders & Wonders
description: The New Leaders & Wonders expansion brings exciting new content to the base game, adding leaders, wonders, and military cards so you can change the flow of history and build even greater civilizations!

name: Blades of Time: Dismal Swamp
description: Sin descripción

name: Mosaic 1% Edition
description: Mosaic 1% Edition bundle contains the Mosaic base game, Original Soundtrack and the 1% DLC.

name: Mosaic 1% DLC
description: Deluxe edition content

name: Bridge Constructor Trains
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowser's Dark Story
description: Bowser's Dark Story is a ROM hack/mod of Paper Mario. The game is an alternative take on the story, from the perspective that tells how it would be if Bowser won against Mario and conquered the Mushroom Kingdom. The player controls the villain, Bowser, through an adventure, finding allies and battling enemies.

name: 武林悍刀行
description: The Devil's Cult invaded the Martial Union, and there were corpses and blood everywhere! Only the protagonist escaped, from then on the burden of saving the jianghu falls on your shoulders. In the classical game of fighting bosses and dropping equipment, there are many novelties added to the game.

name: Rise of Piracy
description: The perfect blend of Action, Adventure and RTS. Begin your journey as the lowly captain of a small vessel. End as the commander of a threatening fleet. Rise to glory how you see fit. Trade, fight, recruit, grow, pillage, ally, destroy & conquer.

name: New World Computing Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Retro Sports Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Fell Seal DLC Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Heli-Yeah! Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Witcher Franchise Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Craft the World: Heart of Evil
description: The Heart of Evil DLC adds a new type of world to the game with opposing fortresses.

name: Dead Age 1 + 2 Bundle

name: Kingdom: Two Crowns - Royal Edition

name: Mutant Football League: LA Power Pack
description: The west is the best – well it was until the big one hit and left behind a burning city in ruins. Thankfully, the stadium survived, and 2 new west coast teams have risen out of the ashes to battle for Mayhem Bowl supremacy. This pack also includes a brand new mutant human species who is ready to unleash his fury on the league.

name: Catacombia
description: 90s VHS Found Footage Survival Horror in Paris Catacombs. Relive Paris' dark memories and relive the lost explorers experience through the recording itself. See if you can alter the outcome.

name: Cyber Defense 2088
description: Cyber Defense 2088 is a fully immersive, 3D VR tower defense shooter. You will fly around in this new cyberspace world to stop attacks with many weapons, turrets, and defenses. Tons of levels and over a dozen cyberpunk music tracks to enjoy!

name: The Tau Ceti Terminus
description: You weren't supposed to the first person to set foot on this rock. Communications out, ship damaged, you are on your own. Solve enough problems and you get to go home in this realistic sci-fi exploration and survival VR game. With a free-form style, your story unfolds depending on what you do next.

name: Soulpath: The Final Journey
description: Soulpath: the final journey, is an oniric journey through human emotions. 9 unique and challenging minigames where gameplay, music and visuals, change to offer surprising VR experiences.

name: SpaceScape
description: SpaceScape is a hardcore rogue-lite platformer in which the player has to either escape the space prison or rise to the challenge and become the ruler of his cell block.

name: Project Crucible
description:
Project Crucible Is based very loosely on the Cancelled Russian F2P Game Halo Online It was eventually modified and rebuilt from the ground up to be free of any reliance on original Cache Files or Code. Under Loose Microsoft Approval this Game is Quietly Being Developed and is intended to be an Open Source Halo Sandbox for anyone who Legally owns Halo The Master Chief Collection.

Project Crucible  Microsoft Corporation. Project Crucible was created by Gungnir Studios under Microsoft's "Game Content Usage Rules" using assets from Halo, and Project Crucible is not endorsed by or affiliated with Microsoft.

name: Worms 2011: Armageddon
description: Worms 2011: Armaggedon is the latest edition (for mobile devices) of the popular multiplayer military strategy and artillery video game series Worms. This installment, along with its predecessor Worms 2010, was developed by Electronic Arts, unlike other editions that have been developed by THQ Wireless.

name: Blade Runner Rogue
description:
Blade Runner Rogue is a turn-based, tactical, sci-fi RPG set in the neo-noir cyberpunk world of Blade Runner.

As a newly appointed blade runner in this sci-fi RPG mobile game, you’re tasked with hunting down rogue replicants as you collect clues to unravel mysteries in neo-noir cyberpunk Los Angeles. Team up with friends, take on your opponents in exciting sci-fi RPG turn-based battles and unleash unique abilities to gain the advantage. In the end it’s up to you to decide the fate of your targets! Will they be retired or will they be spared?

name: Muv-Luv Integrate
description: Sequel to Muv-Luv Alternative.

name: Muv-Luv Resonative
description: The finale to Muv-Luv Unlimited: The Day After.

name: Basketrio
description: Built on motion capture technology, Basketrio is a next-gen basketball mobile game that challenges both your skills and imagination. Equip your player with unique sneakers, outfits and your own customized moves. Take your build to the streets around the world with real-time, skill-centric 3v3 games. Embrace the grind, showcase your style and become a streetball legend.

name: Cell Machine
description:
Arrange cells. Build machines. Destroy enemies.

Each cell on its own has a simple function, like moving or spawning other cells. But when combined, more interesting behavior emerges...

name: Chapter Master
description:
Chapter Master is an unofficial fan project where the player commands a Chapter, an autonomous, largely self-sufficient unit, of Space Marines to defend the Imperium of Mankind from various alien and human threats. The player must contend with enemy forces, the dangers of space travel, and the internal politics of the empire to keep their chapter alive and win glory to their name.

The game is heavily inspired by Master of Orion 2, drawn from a 2011 thread of speculation on 4chan.

The most current version of the game can be downloaded from the thread on Bay12 forums.

name: Phoenix Rising
description: Phoenix Rising is a free fan-made episodic Pokémon RPG developed using RPG Maker XP and the Pokémon Essentials engine. The game is set in a new region known as 'Hawthorne' and will boast changes to the original main-series Pokémon formula to include a more traditional RPG theme as well as many new features.

description: VIP Rebels is a quick & light RTS. It's an army building game where you will use VIPs and their crazy skills to help you protect your elephant treasure wagon. The further you get, the bigger the rewards!

name: Synchronizers: Undead Marines
description: This is a high-quality three-lane tower defense game for a single player initially (and online coop in a near future) for Windows. This is a twist of the Tower Defense genre, keeping what we all love and including interesting mechanics, characters, loads of action and an incredible soundtrack!

name: Island of the Ancients
description: A single-player third-person action-adventure shooter set on a mystical island in the Bermuda triangle. With a companion by your side, fight your way through scores of deadly creatures. Discover new weapons and companions to tip the odds in your favor. Your family's survival depends on it.

name: Other World
description: Adventure of Other Side. A World full of Quests, Equipment, Items and dangerous monsters to discover.

name: Travel the Countries
description: Travel the Countries is a stand-alone card game based on the pre-Qin and Warring States era. Each profession has its own unique cards and skills, with unique neutral cards to form a variety of routines, go to defeat powerful enemies and attack every battle!

name: Keeper
description: A shadow has fallen over the land. Conquer dungeons, discover recipes, craft items, and defeat enemies as the keeper of the Fire, the only one who can save the world from evil in this adventure RPG with cute characters and streamlined crafting.

name: Cyberush
description: Rush through floors of a building on the way to get your revenge on the Boss up top in this fast-paced VR shooter! Choose from four different classes as you swing, blast and slash your way through CYBERUSH!

name: Dreadstone: The Immortal Prisoner
description: Dreadstone: The Immortal Prisoner is an upcoming indie 2D Metroidvania platformer. Especially important to us are the game elements “looting” and “leveling“. The goal is to create a combination of our favorite games.

name: Nuclear War Simulator
description: Nuclear war simulator is a detailed realistic simulation and visualization of large-scale nuclear conflicts with a focus on humanitarian consequences. It lets you design conflict scenarios and estimate the consequences using a population density map and realistic weapons effects.

name: Duelist
description: Duelist is a 2D multiplayer fast-paced shooter game. There are certain themes in the game which player can select. Take a gun and use every skill you have to eliminate your enemies.

name: Lie Yan Chuan Qi
description: Sin descripción

name: 游戏人生：心魔
description: Sin descripción

name: DeHexTD
description: Defend your ever growing platform against an ever rising amount creeps

name: Anyek
description: The Ultimate Platform Puzzle game where the player passes the level without moving input! Instead the player will have to use the keyboard letters to move and pass to the next level.

name: Sleep Tight PC
description: Sleep Tight is a fast paced action horror game. Survive the waves of monsters if you can, upgrade different weapons to help you. Remember pay attention, listen closely, and don't let them get you!

name: Spiral to Despair
description: Spiral to Despair is a blackjack style card game infused with RPG elements set in the depths of hell.

name: Learning jigsaw: Animals
description: Play or study? Now you can do both at the same time. Have fun with this puzzle while learning the names of animals in several different languages.

name: Tiny Room Stories: Pure Escape
description: This is a point and click adventure game with elements of the "Escape the room" mechanics. You have to solve many riddles and puzzles. Visit various places and locations, such as the "Tower of the Magician" or "Spaceship". There is no main story, only escape the room. Pure Escape!

name: Soulmate
description: Soulmate is a game about what insanity can create, in a world full of coincidences.

name: Steel Rain: Dawn of the Machines
description: Steel Rain: Down of the Machines is an amazing action Rogue Like, with randomly generated scenarios and resource exploration. Control war machines on the battlefield, crush your enemies and unlock new skills and weaponry, making you stronger with each race.

name: Brickbuilder VR
description: Brickbuilder VR is a high-fidelity VR model building simulator. With both decorative blocks and mechanical components such as axels, gears and motors, the game enables you to build a wide variety of interesting creations that move and interact with each other in the virtual world.

name: the Mercenary
description: You are a former CIA cleaner who decides to become an unscrupulous mercenary ready to take out anyone for money. Man, woman and children will not be a problem for you. You will travel all over the globe to carry out your contracts and pocket your due.

name: Brick Breaker Heart Collector
description: If you like Breakout / Arkanoid style games, this game is for you.

name: Touhou Koi-Mystery: Legend and Fantasy of Monsters
description:
The game has rich plot with 7 chapters, substantial collection elements, free walking experience, novel but torture bosses.
Game's operation is simple, easy to use, just mouse can play.
It has 3 difficulty modes.
One of which meets the round calculation planning of strategic players;
One real-time combat operation for action players;
There is also a way to completely skip the battle and meet the whole process experience of the plot players.
The plot and atmosphere of the game are relaxed, joyful and pleasant, and you can play at leisure after dinner.

name: Resigned
description: They say quitting is the easy part. Clearly they don't know anything.

name: Project Dark Sky
description: Maya wakes up in the least expected place, at the least expected time...and remembers nothing.

name: Reunion
description: An atmospheric horror game in which you have to look for a couple of friends in love who got lost in the woods after a scandalous party. But do the lovers want to be found? Or do they just want to have fun? The only trouble is that we are not the only ones who hunt them...

name: Living Legends: Voice of the Sea - Collector's Edition
description: The dark seas are calling...

name: What Never Was: Chapter II
description: Sarah finds herself having been magically whisked away to a strange place. Where did the magical clock take her? What more did her eccentric grandfather hide from her? What Never Was: Chapter II is the anticipated sequel to the short free adventure-game What Never Was.

name: Martin and the Magic Staff
description: Discover the world of a fabulous puzzle platformer in the pixel art style. You have to help the aspiring magician to pass all the challenges and fill his sorcerous staff with pure magic.

name: Cube
description: Cube is an intriguing fast paced 2D shooter.

name: WWII Online: Chokepoint
description: WWII Online: Chokepoint is an authentic F2P WW2 Multiplayer Tactical Shooter, driven by teamwork and built-in voice comms. Jump in feet first with the US Airborne or join the Wehrmacht and fight to control iconic chokepoints as an infantryman in Europe between 1944-45. Are you ready for WAR?

name: Roadside Assistance Simulator
description: Roadside Assistance Simulator is an FPP game that will allow you to prove yourself as a road assistance specialist. Get behind the wheel of your mobile auto repair shop, complete orders and earn money to grow your business.

name: I open the harem in the last days
description: What kind of experience is it to travel directly to a place like the end of the world? Fight, ambush, survive? No, no, of course, to start a "happy" harem life, full of wives and concubines~

name: Lords of Cards
description: Lords of Cards is a multi-player, real-time deck building game. Create a deck of 90 cards that you select among more than 60 unique cards. Play them to recruit powerful units that fight in your name, build constructions that improve your economy or cast spells with various effects.

name: Natural Habitat
description: Fight against corporate invaders in challenging match-3 fights that combine turn-based strategy with deck building and an engaging story campaign. Build your deck from over 500 cards and 100 items, plan your strategy and help the locals to reclaim their Natural Habitat!

name: VR Retro Combat Deluxe
description: This is a VR retro arcade game, you will enter the game console to fight your opponents! Players can switch between weapons such as bows and arrows, spells, and fists.

name: Train Simulator: South Devon Main Line: Highbridge and Burnham - Plymouth Route Add-On
description: Explore the iconic Devonian countryside, from rolling hills to famous sea walls, with Just Trains' sprawling South Devon Main Line for Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: Southern Pacific U33C Loco Add-On
description: Classic 1960s and 1970s-era General Electric "U-Boat" diesel locomotives come to Train Simulator with the Southern Pacific U33C/U30C pack from accomplished developer DTM.

name: Tales of Skiora
description: A fantasy JRPG style turn-based investigation and battle game!

name: Boat Warfare
description: You play as a hacked unmanned boat controlled from a Unified Territories of Acirema airplane that is on a stealth mission to destroy the Anihc's port military base and steal their military strategies database before they can attack first.

name: Silent Service 1 + 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Control I & II
description: Sin descripción

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Wasteland 3: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Control: Origins - Galactic Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Wingspan: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Shadows of New York Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Suzerain: Presidential Edition
description: The Presidential Edition includes political drama game Suzerain and its Original Soundtrack. About Suzerain: As President Rayne, lead Sordland into ruin or repair during your first term in this text-based role-playing game. How will you lead?

name: Unto the End: Special Edition
description: Unto The End is a challenging combat adventure game in the style of a cinematic platformer. The Special Edition includes the full game, a deluxe digital art book designed by developer 2 Ton Studios, and the official soundtrack.

name: Sparklite: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción
